recipesJson.name: Bland
recipesJson.author: Dank1
recipesJson.description: This is a test recipe, i wouldn't make it this is only a test

reviews.text: Delicious i removed the CAP Super Sweet and added (DOD) Water Malone @10%
it's punchy, mouthfeel is good, sweetness is there.. could be an all time classic
Pointless. Publishing a test recipe doesn't contribute anything of value to this service. Please just remove it.
I had to pick this flavor up for the review and man was this a good one to have :)
WTF.  Was the test to see if you could make it on the top viewed?
Looks like a pretty decent VGod Clone?
